about.title: About OROBE
about.subtitle: Where tradition meets innovation
about.philosophy-subtitle: We believe in the beauty of simplicity and the power of conscious design
about.philosophy-values-timeless-description: We create pieces that transcend passing trends, designed to endure in both style and quality.
about.philosophy-values-excellence-description: Every detail is meticulously considered, from conception to the final realization of each product.
about.philosophy-values-authenticity-descripti: We maintain the integrity of our values in every decision, creating genuine and meaningful products.
about.philosophy-timeless-description: We create pieces that transcend passing trends, designed to endure in both style and quality.
about.philosophy-excellence-description: Every detail is meticulously considered, from conception to the final realization of each product.
about.philosophy-authenticity-description: We maintain the integrity of our values in every decision, creating genuine and meaningful products.
about.meaning-content1: The word "orb" comes from the Latin orbis, meaning "circle" or "world". This root is associated with the idea of totality and perfection, evoking the perfect form of the circle and its representation of the universe.
about.meaning-content2: It is common to find in ancient iconography gods and authority figures holding an orb, as an emblem of dominion and sovereignty over the world. This vision inspires the OROBE brand to convey balance, elegance and universality in each of its creations.
about.journey-subtitle: The evolution of a vision into a tangible reality
about.timeline-2023-description: The idea is born to create a brand that combines classic elegance with modern functionality, inspired by universal symbols of perfection.
about.timeline-2024-description: We begin the design and development process, collaborating with specialized artisans to bring our first creations to life.
about.timeline-2025-description: OROBE presents itself to the world with its first collection, establishing new standards in minimalist design and exceptional quality.
about.values-subtitle: The principles that guide every decision and every creation
about.values-sustainability-description: Committed to responsible practices that respect our planet and future generations.
about.values-innovation-description: We constantly explore new ways to improve and evolve, always maintaining our essence.
about.values-craftsmanship-description: We value manual work and the dedication that only true artisans can provide.
about.values-community-description: We believe in building lasting relationships with our customers, collaborators and society.

meaning.title: The Meaning of OROBE
meaning.content1: The word "orb" comes from the Latin orbis, meaning "circle" or "world". This root is associated with the idea of totality and perfection, evoking the perfect form of the circle and its representation of the universe.
meaning.content2: It is common to find in ancient iconography gods and authority figures holding an orb, as an emblem of dominion and sovereignty over the world. This vision inspires the OROBE brand to convey balance, elegance and universality in each of its creations.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: We believe in the beauty of simplicity and the power of conscious design

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: The evolution of a vision into a tangible reality

2023.title: The Vision
2023.description: The idea is born to create a brand that combines classic elegance with modern functionality, inspired by universal symbols of perfection.

2024.title: Development
2024.description: We begin the design and development process, collaborating with specialized artisans to bring our first creations to life.

2025.title: Launch
2025.description: OROBE presents itself to the world with its first collection, establishing new standards in minimalist design and exceptional quality.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you
contact.description: Do you have any questions about our collection? Need information about availability or shipping? Don't hesitate to contact us. We'll be happy to help you.

response.title: Response Time
response.description: We commit to responding to all inquiries within a maximum of 24-48 hours during business days.

service.title: Personalized Service
service.description: Every inquiry is important to us. We offer personalized attention to guarantee the best experience with OROBE.
